pages.text: There are three categories of fermented beverages:$(li)$(bold)Ales and Lagers$() start from roasted grains brewed into worts$(li)$(bold)Wines and Ciders$() start from fruit pressed into juices$(li)$(bold)Meads$() start from Honeycombs brewed into must.

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: $(br2)A separate $(l:apiary/honey_mead)Guide to Mead$() is maintained in the $(l:apiary)$(bold)Apiary$() section.
